name: VPCDHCPOptionsAssociation
description: Associates a set of DHCP options (that you've previously created) with the specified VPC.

properties.name: DhcpOptionsId
properties.description: The ID of the DHCP options you want to associate with the VPC. Specify default if you want the VPC to use no DHCP options.

properties.name: VpcId
properties.description: The ID of the VPC to associate with this DHCP options set.
